website_summaries.verdict: At about half the cost of some similar end tables, this set of two is a good value and can be put together in minutes.
pros: Owners appreciate the versatile look, the easy assembly, and the fact it is sturdy and smooth
It stands out for the fact that tables can be stacked so you can easily alter the configuration depending on your needs and space limitations
It is also easy to move
cons: The table is quite lightweight, which some consumers didn't like
It also can't take the weight of heavy items, and a few were disappointed with the construction of the legs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, legs are made out of plastic though. You can stack them together which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Mora

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Legs and feet are cheap plastic, like a toy sword plastic, the boards are cheap plywood that came chipped, the the veneer overlaps terribly, and it is NOT TOOL FREE. The first thing the instructions mention is a rubber mallet. All the edges look terrible, so I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Iding

customer_reviews.title: ... brought these for my living room and I really like them. The assembly was quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my living room and I really like them. The assembly was quick and easy. My only issue was that they were a bit shorter than what I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Dont let the price fool you..these table are inexpensive but do not look cheap in my home. Very sturdy and a nice wood finish
customer_reviews.author: LaTayshja

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Except for...
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is really easy. Except for the plastic pieces, you have to "hammer" in to the wood boards, in order to screw the legs into place. I ended up having to put on some boots and step on them, as I did not have a "rubber mallet" as the instructions called for. Even with my full body weight on the pieces some still refused to go in, until I slightly jumped on them. With that being said, the assembly was very simple and the tables work perfect as my night stands.
customer_reviews.author: Elias C.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a Joke
customer_reviews.text: I think this table would have worked for me except for the fact that the first step in putting it together was to pound in these 'insert caps' in the table. I didn't even get that far as the caps were larger than the holes to pound them in - everyone of them. Quite funny actually but I will never buy another Furinno table..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lee

customer_reviews.title: I want better.
customer_reviews.text: This is made of plastic and wood that it is as fragile as cardboard. I don't believe it could hold more than 10-15 pounds and stay upright. I couldn't trust my speakers underneath, or my DVD player on top. It was too wobbly. It's cheap, and you get what you pay for. I want better.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmín

customer_reviews.title: Very low cost and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about two end tables for 25 bucks. These actually turned out great. Very cheap, very simple, but they look nice. Assembly is easy, just screw in the plastic legs, layer on the second shelf, and screw on the end caps. These can’t hold much weight though so don’t plan on putting anything heavy on it. Tv remote and some small decorations/a drink is what I’d trust it with. Instructions say up to 10lbs. I’d buy these again. Great product for what you pay. Only one star off because the leg supports are a little cheap even for how cheap this thing is, but not really a problem at all. It’s 25 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Zanecrc

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, missing parts, defective
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would, first off I’m missing an insert cap, second the holes that the insert caps go in are too small for the caps to even fit, it says to insert them using a rubber mallet but I’m laughing like there’s no way even doing that they would fit, and finally the legs are hollow plastic like a children’s toy. I opened the box and was laughing hysterically at how cheap the materials used to make the legs were. Please don’t buy this, i was suckered in cause the price and reviews but literally this is a children’s toy set.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic budget end tables
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why so many people are hating on these end tables. They're dirt cheap! If you cheapo's wanted to spend 10x this amount on end tables, you every right to complain about press board and plastic legs. But you are looking for premium furniture on a Walmart budget. These end tables actually pretty good! Especially for the money. It took me literally 4 mins to put together (both tables), and I did it without a single tool. The tables are fairly sturdy, and look nice enough to pass off as being 2-3x the price I paid for them. They're a little short, but that's fine. I didn't need them to be much taller. I love lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Mark T. Brody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable for the price, TOOL-FREE install was very nice. The black plastic legs look so nice, I wish the fake wood 2 layers were also made of this material. Photo shows some natural edge dings on the wood, but a flawless black set of legs. If you're going to use these to hold items, the flaws will disappear, making this an incredible buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Low expectations, low price
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble. Yes they're super cheap and light weight and kinda wonky when you put them together but I just wanted these to be in the bedroom to hold up little things and it looks awesome. You'd never know they were plastic. I mean, you get 2 of them for a super low price, what are people expecting?
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tables for your bedside.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for bedside use and could not be happier. They can hold a lot of heavy objects and are very sturdy. Assembly was very easy and only took about 5 - 10 minutes per table. As you can see in the pictures, each piece has a letter on it. The directions instruct you which pieces connect with each other. If you are looking for a sturdy small nightstand, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: John Couch

customer_reviews.title: it wasn't good enough, he proceeded to hammer it in with ...
customer_reviews.text: We can't even put it together. The pieces don't fit so my fiancé filed them down, it wasn't good enough, he proceeded to hammer it in with a rubber mallet and it split the bottom piece. We had spray painted it in hopes we could make it work. Still not together and still has so much work to be done and bought for it. Might end up just throwing away all together before we spend more time and money. I understand its cheap... it should still go together. I wasn't expecting much from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jay

customer_reviews.title: Well....
customer_reviews.text: They do what I want them to do. They hold my work PC as well as my little turntable/CD player and hasn't dumped anything on the floor yet, so.... Absolutely surprised me at how easily they went together. You could be completely inept with mechanical skills and still put these together like a pro in no time! I gave them only 4 stars for sturdiness due to the fact, I wouldn't want to trust them to hold my gaming rig or anything EXTREMELY important to me....but, they do work and they're easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis_S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, does the job, but very showing of its cheapness
customer_reviews.text: Putting these together was a breeze, just screw the legs on, then lay the lower shelf on, then screw on the feet. They serve their purpose as endtables fairly well as a result. They are quite short and small, however, resting a good few inches lower than most sofa arms. The quality of the material is plywood and plastic, so they definitely aren't sturdy by any means. Their surface area allows it to hold a dinner plate, a drink, with some room leftover for miscellaneous items like a remote. I consider these a good choice for "disposable" furniture. They're something that gets the job done, but isn't really anything to rely on or care about if it gets damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Obbi

customer_reviews.title: Where baroque meets broke
customer_reviews.text: If you're baroque, these are just the thing. They are there best and worst all in one. Super-easy to assemble, and reasonably solid. Yet, the flimsy surface laminate of each of mine was marred. Fortunately, I had a matching wood-floor-repair marker handy. Done! Incredibly low-rise for a table, they seem miniature. Yet, seated in a recliner, drinks fall perfectly to hand. So these baroque tables might earn a middling three stars - except . . . They cost $27.
customer_reviews.author: Strat58 cat

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The wrong color was sent to me. I ordered the espresso black, but got the grey. There were some minor scratches on the table top, but it isn't that noticeable. I decided to keep the grey ones since it's already here. But that doesn't make it alright for them to ship the wrong color. It's definitely not something really sturdy, but what do you expect from less than $25 for two. It does what it needs to do which is to hold your phone, small stuff and even a lamp. Don't place something heavy on it and expect it to hold up. Bottom line, decent and does what it needs to for my household.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise when two tables arrived
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting one table, wasn't paying attention, I guess. So I am using the second one for a tablet stand by my computer (I am an artist). You really get a lot for the money, if you are looking for a temporary table for small area. Only downside is that they are easy to tip over if your foot lifts the table by the bottom shelf when you are moving around. It is just in the right height for this to happen. I wouldn't put anything breakable on them. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fye

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These tables arrived today (3-13-19) and were easily assembled without tools in less then ten minutes. Three of the four shelves arrived slightly scratched and a bottom shelf is chipped along one edge, but since others have already posted photos of their scratched shelves that appear about the same as mine, I'm not going to bother with posting photos of these. Had they arrived without these imperfections and at this price I would have rated them five stars. Were it not for these appearance problems they would look really nice, as though they cost more. Since I don't intend to place these tables in highly-visible locations, they will serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Young Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for what I needed. I spaced them out at the end of my king sized bed so that I could put my 43" TV at the foot of the bed. Just the right amount of table space for the TV and a soundbar. A mid-sided computer tower fit perfectly on the bottom of one and a battery backup/surge protector fit nicely on the bottom of the other one. I over-tightened the first leg and snapped the end off. Some general purpose adhesive fixed it right up. Just snug up the legs, don't crank too hard on them.
customer_reviews.author: Wall Stickz

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner-friendly furniture!
customer_reviews.text: These end tables were so easy to assemble, and they're holding up great. They look just like the pictures and are the perfect size, just the right height to sit next to my couch. It's not fancy, but if you're looking at these, that's not what you're aiming for, right? I love how they have 2 usable levels - I didn't realize that would matter, but it does look much nicer to have some books or decoration on that bottom shelf (as opposed to closed doors, or on the floor below for ones that don't have the shelf).
customer_reviews.author: Aaren L

customer_reviews.title: An impressively sleek table
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't perfect, and at it's modest price tag you can't expect it to be. My tables came with scuffed wood and other artifacts, I will consider these to be manufacturer defects and will not judge my review on them. The tables are very easy to assemble, you don't need any tools and it will take you about 10 minutes. They fit in small spaces well, however I feel the sturdiness isn't great when stacking them upon one another.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and a modern, clean look!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little table. It’s small indeed, but gets the job done and looks modern and clean. I thought the package only came with one table and it comes with two so that was a pleasant surprise and now we use the extras by the living room table here and one outside on the porch. I like that it has a bottom to it so we can put things there so the top doesn’t get too crowded. Buy it! Cheapest you’ll find, trust me, I looked.
customer_reviews.author: Sarena

customer_reviews.title: Simple, useful end tables
customer_reviews.text: Box is light and assembly takes less than 10 minutes for both. I use them on carpet so I cant comment on if there's any wobble or not, but they are typical particle board variety with plastic pillars, and you can tell by looking that the pillars are plastic. They dont look like luxury furniture, but function just fine and fit a modern style living room. That's all I needed them for, and I'd recommend them for anyone who needs the same.
customer_reviews.author: MachineShopJoe

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I moved to a much bigger apartment, I got tired of using moving boxes as end tables so I found these. They are inexpensive, they arrived quickly, set up was easy and didnt require any tools. They do what end tables are supposed to do, they're lightweight and sturdy enough to hold drinks. I don't expect them to last long term, one day I'll upgrade but right now I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Beale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy little side tables!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my bedroom to put on the sides of my bed as I didn't have much room left. I needed something small but sturdy and these are definitely sturdy. They fit right in to the little spot I had set out for them. Super easy assembly, took me about 5 minutes for both tables. No screws or screw driver is required! They can also be stacked. For cleaning I've been using a multipurpose cleaner and the tables have not been damaged or anything; leaving a cup on it does not leave those circle marks or damage the table either. Money well spent, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Green

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to assemble, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to assemble! No tools needed. I was done in a matter of minutes. It’s super lightweight so definitely no heavy items on there (it says no more than 10lbs), and no kids climbing or sitting on it. It’s pretty low, which is perfect as a nightstand for our low bed. If you don’t touch the legs, you won’t even notice that it’s pvc. Highly recommend for its simplicity, price and ease of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Madoka P

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Approved
customer_reviews.text: I needed some small tables to use in my classroom for kids to work at and these were so easy to put together. It literally took me 5 minutes, with no tools. The only reason they get 4 stars is because they are pretty cheaply made (you get what you pay for I guess) and I can tell they will begin to fall apart over time, especially with the wear and tear in a classroom setting.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, large surface area, beautiful, easy to put together! (My child did it!)
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT; my 12 year old daughter put these together for me in a snap. They're that simplistic AND they look beautiful. The bad reviews likely come from someone who got a damaged item (these things happen) or didn't quite get the pegs to screw together properly. But if my 12 year old could do it for me while I work (I work remotely) then you adults should have no problem lol. Great stands and I may order more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy construction, very sturdy, perfect for my purposes!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these tables are excellent for storing game consoles! And all you need is a rubber mallet to hammer in the feet so the tables rest nice and evenly on the floor. The rest is some mid-level hand-and-arm torque and a passable eye for what looks good in a room, which is definitely what these tables do! Great craftsmanship as always, Furinno! I have your Simple Study Table in this same color in another room to make my computer's corner desk into an L desk, and it's WONDERFUL. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Wade Manns

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with the right parts, breaks upon first trying to put the non fitting plastic screws in the 3 sizes too small hole.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these I assumed they would be cheap junk for the price. I didn't think that they'd litterally break on first impact of the first step of the directions. It wants you to put plastic screws into it with a mallet, but the hole isn't the right size for the screw. So after 1 hit of the mallet the entire corner broke off and it is now useless. Hoping I can get a refund because these are completely and utterly useless if they can't even package screws that fit. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: shayne

customer_reviews.title: Cute, affordable, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love them for the small space I have! Because I need to move one every time I practice yoga, the lightweight is wonderful. And they look great with my other furniture. Keep in mind that these are a less expensive alternative to a solid wood end table. The legs are plastic. If you need sturdy, don't buy these. I put them both together in about 6 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a TWO PACK
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think it was made very clear that qty 1 includes two stands. Anyway, this is a great product, easy to put together (under 5 minutes), and is simple enough that it goes with just about anything
customer_reviews.author: KReview

customer_reviews.title: Good minimalist tables at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a printer in my office and a lamp in my living room. They are not the strongest tables and I wouldn't recommend placing real heavy items on them, but they were perfect for my needs and just as I expected. With a rubber mallet you can put these together by yourself in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you cannot beat these tables! Of course they are not high end, but for $26 for 2, I wouldn't expect that. I purchased them to sit my African violets on because they were getting too big for my window sill. They worked perfectly for my needs. They are sturdy, look nice and the perfect size. I wouldn't imagine they'd hold up well to a lot of use but for me they are perfect. I put them together in about 2 minutes. Super easy. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the description
customer_reviews.text: I’m thoroughly happy with these side tables. You do not need tools. I read one review that said you needed a rubber mallet. No you don’t! Of course they are cheap. What do you expect for that price. If you read the description and some of the reviews, you know what to expect. Yes, the legs are plastic with a thin piece of particleboard as the base and tabletop. I’m using them in a small spare bedroom where I didn’t want to spend a lot of money. These are perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really liked how easy and simple it was to put together. Literally 2 steps. Some people mentioned you needed a rubber mallet? I’m not sure what for and the instructions say nothing about it or any other tools for that matter. You just twist the legs into the boards. Plastic legs but with it all put together you can’t really tell it’s plastic and it feels sturdy. Has a strong manufactured plastic smell at first but 10hours later I don’t smell it anymore. Fits our small lamp, a book and a decent sized candle with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quick

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I would not call these sturdy or "high-end", but they look nice and they hold stuff, plus it's a two-pack, and they're easy to assemble. All in all, definitely a good buy and I totally recommend picking these up.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy!Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a crowded space
customer_reviews.text: These tables arrived in good time and were simple to put together. As we have a good-sized family when we gather and the room in which we congregate is not too large, these tables are perfect for the occasional soda or plate or book or whatever needs a place to rest. The color was as described and goes well with the remainder of the furniture. They are not too heavy, so I can easily move them to vacuum. Good fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keene

customer_reviews.title: Nice End Tables For My Guest Room
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong with these end tables. The quality of the material is lower end and the legs are made literally out of the same material as plastic swords but I was planning on putting them in a room I don't use often and from a few feet away they look nice. I did have to use a furniture repair marker to fix the chipping around the edges of the wood and after that they looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: it’s worth the $23
customer_reviews.text: I am a real clutz and I still put it together in about 15-20 minutes ...first time I put it together backwards ...then I redid ....it it’s pretty cheap ...but with a little good wood polish it looks more expensive than it is ...what are you to expect for two tables for 23 bucks ...little wobbly ...but again I put on some nice furniture polish for wood and a looks more expensive than it is ..if a klutz like me can put it together in a few minutes anybody can ....I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kent K.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly cheap
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even think anyone would offer way undersized end tables constructed from poorly finished cheap and thin particle board and plastic blow molded legs. I even had to add my own sticky don't-scratch-your-floor felt pads. I think the tables are rated for 10LBs, I question that load rating. Do yourself a favor and go to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Both arrived damaged...
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap tables. You get what you pay for and I didn't expect much for the price I paid. However, since both top pieces came with chips in the material that covers the visible surface I can't give it any better than 1 star! The table top is black and there are small white spots on both pieces. Even if you just want a cheap table I would look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and functional
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly pleased with these. I was skeptical when I saw the price thinking these would be so cheap and when they said the legs were pvc pipes I was worried. But you can’t even tell it is! These assembled in minutes and they’re so lightweight we can move them around and they’re a perfect size for next to the couch to hold drink or phone, etc. just be careful and don’t leave wet drinks on there as water over time will definitely bubble the wood. They aren’t elegant fancy end tables but for the price they’re great and look cute too!
customer_reviews.author: vmarie

customer_reviews.title: cheap but does the job for the purpose (Updated: brilliant speaker stands)
customer_reviews.text: Updated review- After one year, these tables (err speaker stands) have held up extremely well as I have moved furniture around. They feel sturdy, look good and serve their purpose. I bought these tables specifically as wide stands to support my KEF bookspeakers in a dog-proof home. Unlike thin stands, these cannot be knocked over easily. They look fine. It's cheap furniture, but is entirely functional for our needs. And if it saves expensive speaker damage, then great. 4 star review seems about right.
customer_reviews.author: D'harans

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap made. Somehow sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I have mixing feelings. When I receive it and while I was building it I realized how cheap it was (cheap wood, plastic legs, the rim is chipped, it’s so lightweight the manual says only for 10lb). Then I put everything on it and somehow looked sturdy. If you’re looking something for a few years and for small spaces it’s ok. If you’re looking for a furniture that last forever it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrton

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and look good considering. The corner column pieces are made of plastic and I'd recommend taking care with how rough you are on them, but great for the price point and when you really need some end tables
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Haring

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. They are very easy to put together even though there were no directions. We needed something quick and reasonably priced and that is exactly what they are. Also i highly suggest using coasters or you will get bubbles/water marks due to the material but that's my only gripe about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Burge

customer_reviews.title: Very light and fast to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: i like being able to have a table next to my chair or in front of me when im gaming. I wouldnt recommend standing on them to reach a high shelf, but there perfect for setting down a beverage or a controller and they are so small and light that moving and storing them if you want some more space is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Robert stroup

customer_reviews.title: Really great for display home decorations!
customer_reviews.text: I like that is really simple to assembly. This two tables make great compliment for small spaces and light things. Table legs are plastic, however for the price is so great. I bought this one from Amazon Warehouse deals and have minor cosmetic defect in the back of one of the table that can’t even be seen after assembled. I used tables for decoration purposes and are really great for display home decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I thought and smaller but these are actually perfect for what I needed them for they are for my zen room to hold my items on so I need them to be small. My husband put them together while I was meditating so it was pretty quick and he’s not the handiest so I would say it was pretty darn easy!
customer_reviews.author: Monica O.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal !!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the furniture about a month now, and I can safely say this is a great value if your looking for super budget furniture. They all arrived on time without any damage. Assembly was straight forward. And they look way more fancy that they cost. I bought the matching TV stand, 2 4-tier shelves, and a pair of end tables. The living room looks very modern with the full matching set. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B R J

customer_reviews.title: Cheap end tables with absolutely no weight to them
customer_reviews.text: They do not line up with sofas. Just an FYI. They are lower to the ground. Install took 2 minutes for both tables. I wanted something cheap because I know my infant will only color, spill, run into these. In hindsight I should have got something with more weight because if you sneeze these practically blow over. Fake wood, of course. But you’ll be totally fine if people mess them up! They don’t hold much space either. See pictures for references
customer_reviews.author: JenniferTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great accent tables!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, you can NOT hammer the little grey things into the bottom holes and spools, but you don't need them. Just screw the bottoms on and lay the top in the grooves and you're all set. Looks like great wood. For this price, we are buying 10 for our home. Love it! Perfect. They're a little higher than a coffee table, so the perfect height right against a chair to rest your drink on. Perfect right next to the sofa too! It's not Ethan Allen, but for this price, no one will know or care!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Not so Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: It’s good and functional. I like it for our bedroom. I use it as a nightstand for our phones and my humidifier. But I do have a slight pet peeve with it. So you need a hammer to install it. Technically you do. I don’t have one. So I laid the top board with the 4 inserts on the ground. I then placed the bottom board on top of it. I then stepped on it so the inserts filled in place. Other than that, when you install the legs, the bottom pieces of the leg just don’t screw nicely to line in place. You can make it look that way. But I just wish it just didn’t look so plastic-like.
customer_reviews.author: HelloKiwii

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for what we needed. We just needed two small bedside tables and that's what we got with these. There was no damage to any part of them. Very easy to assemble and held my 12lb cat when she decided to lay across the bottom shelf after it was assembled. They stand straight, don't wobble. They look really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with tables
customer_reviews.text: These tables are AMAZING. We keep them on our porch and they have survived the rain as well which is super impressive. Easy to assemble. Super sturdy and I want to buy more to replace the more expensive worn down side tables I have inside. I wouldn’t have bought them if it weren’t for the amazing price and sturdiness. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent example of function over form.
customer_reviews.text: These are *really* cheap, not like inexpensive cheap, like low grade recycled plastic and strand board covered in cheap contact paper cheap. I was a little horrified when assembling them by how cheesy they were. With that said, they're surprisingly sturdy and, infinitely useful. They are not especially pretty, but I love these things as long as I don't look at them too closely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Horst

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Overall: 4 Description Accuracy: 5 Pictures Accuracy: 5 Quality: 3 Worth the Price: 4 Tagline: Easy to Assemble, Cheap, and Small My Summary: You get what you paid for. It is wood like shelves and plastic legs. The shelves are about 15 1/2 inches square. They are stackable with some pieces left over. They fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I only paid $23.70 for these two little tables. I expected cheap, low quality... What I didn't expect was that someone forgot the threading on the top of one leg. Bwahahaha! I just left off the part under the tabletop that it would have screwed into. They'll do. I put them in a guest room that will rarely be used. They are good for a quick cheap set up. I wouldn't expect any durability though. We're in a corporate house situation, so I'm not investing what I would at home. Probably good for a dorm. They are okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brain_Sick_Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Ok tables
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the tables to have plastic bars connecting the two boards together. These look good and did the job because I needed cheap bed side tables . Just up close it’s so obvious they are super cheap , low quality tables that won’t be lasting very long. I don’t regret buying them but probably would of gotten another set if I realized just how cheap these look up close. Again you have to get up close to see this so they do work as bed side tables. In the living room no way.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, the palatic pieces break.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. 1. The instructions say NO TOOLS NEEDED. However, you need a mallet. 2. The top and bottom shelf areally pressed board, no biggy. The 'hardware' is plastic. The legs are plastic. The feet are plastic. Plastic breaks when you use a rubber mallet to push the plastic pieces in. 3. These are good if 100% plan to use them as long as they hold up with the expectation that between day 1 and day ?? You will just throw them out. 4. Perfect for a dorm. 5. No spare plastic pieces.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Impossible, frustrating assembly; tiny side tables
customer_reviews.text: While the the product page lists this item as no tools required to assemble, it is almost impossible to assemble these tables without a hammer. After trying to hammer in the base multiple ways for about 30mins, my husband and I gave up on these tables. I have purchased and assembled multiple Furinno display shelves in the past and those were a breeze. Very disappointed in this product. Also it’s bulky enough that it’s not worth the hassle of repackaging and returning. Also, review the dimensions carefully, theyre smaller than what you would expect from an end table. More like a small cube.
customer_reviews.author: ZraveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assyemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter - so understand I have not personally seen them. BUT she was able to put them together with no problems and I know she doesn't have a soft hammer/mallet. She loves them and has them on either side of her bed to hold a clock on one and a bedside lamp on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Good value for simple items
customer_reviews.text: It is a pair of simple end tables, which were simple to assemble. Exterior 'finish' looks good. Good value proposition. My needs were simple and I do not intend to use it for very heavy things, but it does not feel rickety or fragile. They are pretty short, so you wouldn't use these as a table you'd interact with while standing (unless you stacked them, I suppose). The dimensions are listed in the description, so check them out if that's a concern.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY E STEIGERWALD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but wish they were metal instead of PVC
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a set of nightstands that are inexpensive and easy to put together, these might do the job. Overall I think they were worth the $40 I paid for the pair, but have since seen them back up to the fifty dollar rice. Just a note. I don't think they are $50 nightstands, but they do the job and look nice where I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S Fazekas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother. Worse than cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I understood 100% this wouldn’t be “nice furniture” however I didn’t realize I was paying for some that was already broken/would break so easily while putting it together. The first table went together fine. The second has a leg that won’t tighten because the plastic doesn’t have the correct grooves to screw in (the shavings were still inside) and another piece broke off while tightening before it was even halfway tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap workable table but NEEDS mallet to assemble
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Wood boards are thin and legs are plastic. Still, the table works fine. Pros: -It's cheap and you get 2. -relatively easy to assemble -doesn't really wobble Cons: -needs a mallet. That should be put clearly in the product description -wood is thin. Don't put too much on it -plastic can deform if you're too rough on it It's reasonably priced. However, I gotta take off a star for not clearly stating that a tool is required for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly worried about the quality due to other reviews, but I’m pleasantly surprised at how perfect this is for what I needed it for! My Xbox One fits perfectly, and the table feels much more stable than I expected! I was planning to put it on the bottom shelf initially, but the top shelf works too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: 10 pounds
customer_reviews.text: They go together easily once you realize the picture instructions say turn the posts counterclockwise instead of the correct clockwise. The caps are a compression fit and you need a mallet or somesuch to seat them properly. They make a nice but simple table. Unfortunately, Amazon does not tell anywhere that the weight limit per shelf is 10 lbs. This is in the assembly instructions. I came across these while searching for speaker stands. My speakers weigh 15 lbs. I think it's misleading that Amazon doesn't tell you up front that they support 10 lbs per shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price for an Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT end tables. I wanted cheap but good end tables and that's what I got. They look nice too, me and the wife are happy. Before I had a stupid wicker table to put my stuff on...and of course things would fall over easy if they didn't have a wide enough base. Cons: None. I will say though, if you're one of those people that expect $200 worth of quality out of an over $20 product and rate this product low because of the quality you should have expected, then you shouldn't be writing Amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Amidon

customer_reviews.title: good enough.
customer_reviews.text: these are good for small spaces, but pretty flimsy and extremely light. granted, pressboard isn't good quality anyway, least of all at this price point, but even given that, these unusually unstable, and we don't expect them to survive more than a year. wouldn't recommend putting more weight on them than a water glass and a cell phone. (fortunately, those are the purposes they're intended to serve here.) easy enough to put together; took me about five minutes, although bear in mind, i'm pretty much an expert at putting together pressboard furniture pieces (ha), so your mileage may vary. ;) (really, unless you're five years old, you can put these together.)
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive Review
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Pressboard and plastic construction, pleasantly sturdy. The color is closer to dark gray than brown. Some inconsistencies in manufacturing resulting in imprecise edges and overlapping of edge material. Remedied by putting this edge to the back. Assembly: Simple and straight forward. If you do not have or want to use a rubber mallet to seat the leg connection on the top, gently place your heel on the piece and carefully apply pressure (do not stomp). There will be two 'pops' if you choose to use this method. Excellent value for the budget wise, minimalist and/or space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not extermely high quality, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These end tables are not true black, but are a very dark color. They were extremely easy to put together and came with directions. There was no screwing or measuring. All that was required was a soft hammer. The tops are hard and so are the bottoms, but the legs are made of a hard plastic material. Both my tops came with little scratch marks on them, probably from rubbing while in shipment. They weren't expensive so they aren't extremely high quality, but they work for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good duo for anyone with a rented room or small space
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy to assemble and light weight and as expected. Might be priced a little too high for what the material/weight capacity but perfect end tables or printer table for quick fix/need without paying a fortune. And it comes w two tables but other one is in other side of room being used as well.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: and it assembled easily in less than five minutes per table
customer_reviews.text: Knowing this product was cheap, I didn't expect much. Instructions were clear, and it assembled easily in less than five minutes per table. I'm disappointed that the legs are a cheap hollow plastic, but I didn't assume much going in. I would rate it higher given the low standards I had for the desk anyway, but even after properly assembly it seems a bit flimsy. The plastic legs just don't provide the stability you'd expect. Great for college students or the like, but if you're considering this item for your adult living room, I'd think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vallon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Moved across country with no furniture. Cheap tables that do what you would expect of a cheap table. It holds my drinks, papers and whatever I sit on it. I didn't buy it expecting high end furniture. For the price, we are quite happy with what we got. Update: almost 3 years later and we are still using these in our family room. They have held up fairly well just have to be careful and not pick them up by the top because it likes to jump off the legs. I would say we have definitely got our money's worth out of them
customer_reviews.author: WaresWashington

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. They all came from amazon, except my cat :) lol. The product is made from lesser quality wood then certain other expensive products. Its light weight, but also very study and tough. I like my Kitty Lilly to have her own space in each room so I bought this b/c it had that extra space on the bottom I can put her bed in, and space on the top to put my electronics. Awesome buy, Kitty approved. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: VMaryH

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The tables are the cutest! I was looking for something temporary and cheap, and these are perfect! I put one on each side of my small futon and they’re the perfect height! They are as sturdy as you would imagine a $25 table with plastic legs and no screws would be, but they are still sturdy enough to hold drinks and a candle and a lamp. Perfect for someone like me who moves every year and my style changes every 20 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Wilson McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Break
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. I bought this because I had nowhere to set my cup easily in an apartment I’m leaving in the next two months. Pros - keeps your cup next to you Cons - super flimsy - cheap and easily broken I just wouldn’t recommend this at all. Get a nice end table that will last for years. This will last you a couple months if you use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Great tables for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product couldn’t be happier with the way they came out you could stack them but then you wouldn’t be able to put much weight on the top shelf it says 10 pounds but could hold more weight forsure anything heavy just put on a lower shelf and it’ll be fine
customer_reviews.author: Anthony scott

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Its nice to find something that does what you want even better than you wanted. Simple tables, E A S Y to put together, sturdy, yet not over engineered. Sometimes simple means easy to break, over torque here or there by accident and its done. These tables are so easy to put together and so forgiving in the process and light to carry around the house to place. They make small spaces appealing or for those of us that like "less is more".
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quite Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of goofy to put together and tap down. I regretted buying it at first as it seems cheap when you see the part which is unfinished and putting it together is so much...meh. But, I've forgotten (until now) how much paid for and all else and it gets compliments. I have it holding a fairly large white lily plant on coasters on the top area and other items like the gallon water on the bottom and it works fine with no complaints and is easy to clean. So, It gets the thumbs up! :)
customer_reviews.author: Captain Awesomeness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect end tables
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for these two tables! They are very easy to assemble. I had no issue. Nothing was cracked or broken. Yes the legs are plastic. The tops are wood, not the thickest, but I am using them for my meditation alter. My buddha statue in the picture is about 15 pounds. So it holds some weight. If you want something that is inexpensive and functional and nakes your space nice, these are for you. I will be ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my space!
customer_reviews.text: So easy and quick to assemble. Fits perfect next to my queen sized bed. Does exactly what I need it to. Be a place to charge my phone, rest my water cup and a place close to bed for my oil burner. Bottom level I keep things I need bedside for my new born. I got a dollar store storage bin and piled in all the things I will need.
customer_reviews.author: T Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good price & look nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anyone who is trying to save money especially and have 2 matching end tables. I personally use them as night stands in my room and the setup for them was extremely easy but does require a hammer which i was caught off guard with but wasn't an issue. The tables are actually good quality and hold up nicely. The legs on the tables though are a hard plastic, which is sturdy but I know for some people thats a deal breaker. The one thing I would recommend this for though is for people that don't need them so high up. These tables are a little bit smaller in height but they do hold weight pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable and sturdy multipurpose end tables!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy tables, surfaces are wood-particle board. (Legs) are plastic. Quick and easy assembly! I purchased to use one of them to create a "double shelf" on top of a 2 drawer metal file cabinet. This allowed me to put my mini custom pc on one shelf (bottom) and my printer on the top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Kev Tomford

customer_reviews.title: Good for looks not use
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my spare bedroom when guests come over and I really enjoy their look but they don’t hold up. I left a cup of water on one for about 10-15 minutes and they are now ruined. The top looks like it is coming up in places, huge bubble ring, it’s just a mess. They are also pretty flimsy (they have plastic tubes as the ‘bars’ you see). I’ve never had this problem with my other furniture 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 Sets
customer_reviews.text: I Bought Six Of These (Three Sets) Since You Can Build Them On Top Of Each Other And Set Them Almost Anywhere You Want Especially In A 400 Square Ft Apartment Like I Have. Last Furinno Thing I Had Was Damaged Lightly By USPS But The Company Must Have Rose Some Hell Because I Havent Seen Any Scratches Or Gouges On Any Of The Three Sets
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Cheap, But Worked For Our Purposes.
customer_reviews.text: These were not the highest quality (plastic legs and plywood base/tops), but they functioned well for our event. We ordered 48 of these (for 96 tables total) for an event and they looked good int he room. I'd say maybe 6 of the 96 were damaged in one way or another when opening them up, and another 4 or so got damaged when we were putting them together (tightened the legs too tightly and they broke). But for the price, they were a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EcoGal

customer_reviews.title: Barbie, I found your tables!
customer_reviews.text: Ever wanted a Barbie Dreamhouse? Here are your end tables! Fake wood and heavy plastic. Twist it together, just like Ken did. It’s cheap because it’s inexpensive. If you are also cheap (“frugal”) then buy these like I did. Well, I did it because I’m poor. But it looks nice enough and will surely last a year or two. I bought another set as nightstands for my daughters’ beds. Whatever works, cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: jen sun

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 3 stars because ultimately it isn't terrible if you are on a serious budget
customer_reviews.text: Particle board shelves I expected for this price range, but the plastic legs well let's just say this unit spares no cost savings. The instructions even claim no tools are required, but the first step is to use a mallet! Well I managed by using a hard surface and just standing on it to let my weight do the trick. I gave it 3 stars because ultimately it isn't terrible if you are on a serious budget and just need a couple small end tables then this will work. I'd rather go find something secondhand than spend the $25 on something that literally costs a few cents. The entire unit cost is all shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Insanelycool

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, don't look great
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were...a better wood when I bought them. My fault for not reading more carefully. The legs and feet are a cheap extruded plastic with shnivelly bits you have to shake out before installation. The wood is a rather dirty particle board which looks terrible from the side and even worse from the bottom. Make sure these aren't visible up close to your visitors if you get them. Might pat $10 for them at Walmart to use in a closet if I could do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Needed furniture / end tables for cheap (poor grad student). These are perfect, super easy to assemble, and they look good. The legs are plastic, which is fine because you only know it if you feel it. The customer service was great: The box came with a missing part (the grey cap you need to fit the leg into the table). I emailed them with my order number, missing part, and my address and I had another one sent to me without question within a couple of days. I was surprised with how fast it was replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Despotovich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, inexpensive and good packaging!
customer_reviews.text: These little tables (2) arrived in a sturdy, well packaged box to the point of, nothing was damaged, chipped or scratched. Assembly took about 5 minutes for each table. I have s few small and lightweight items placed on these tables and they do just fine. The tables can be assembled as 1 tall piece by assembling one table on top of the other. You end up with an extra top and 4 feet. Overall, good deal and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: No tools required is a lie
customer_reviews.text: Just finished building them so I'll update if anything changes but they are just basic little stands. Just needed something to put my remote and phone on by my bed. So yeah. Only reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because it says no tools required and then step 1 required a tool I didn't have and that wasn't included. Oh and make sure you pay attention to which direction the panels are facing before you tighten everything. One of mine has the wood grain going opposite directions -_-
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good End Tables for the price
customer_reviews.text: Okay...so these two tables were perfect. Shipping was fast and easy thanks to amazon prime. They arrive in a small box, I am female with small hands so easy to carry. They don’t require screws, screw driver and anything all tools are included. I used a hammer that’s about it. They seem steady. A couple scuff marks on the edges but for the price I can just use some sharpie and color it in (really not major scuff marks) the material doesn’t seem like a material you want to leave a cup of water on because it might make the surface bubble up. So use coasters.
customer_reviews.author: mykia r.

customer_reviews.title: Product reflects the price
customer_reviews.text: When the box arrived it was so small. It was actually smaller than most boxes I will get one book from Amazon shipped in. I opened the box and just had to laugh. Cheap materials very flimsy. Honestly I was going to just use them for about a month until my other furniture came in however I decided to just go without
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pressboard and plastic legs
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom of the tables are pressboard with black veneer, only on the tops and side. The bottoms side is pressboard with no veneer. The legs are plastic. It’s very cheap quality. However, we needed something simple to put in my kids room to put their iPads on for zoom calls, so I choose to keep them. Good for light use but nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: M30

product_meta.title: Furinno Simplistic End Table, Espresso/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso/Black| Design:End TableThis simplistic Series end table two-piece set is designed to fit in your space, your style and fit on your budget. This unit is so simple, both in design and assembly. It uses the turn-s-tube mechanism to assemble the unit in 5 minutes. It is proven to be the most popular RTA furniture due to its functionality, price, and the no hassle assembly. The DIY project in assemble these products can be fun for kids and parents. There are no screws involved, thus it is totally safe to be a family project. Just turn the tube to connect the panels to form a storage shelf.
feature_bullets: Sold in Set of two; fits in Y our space, fits on your budget
Material: CARB compliant composite wood and PVC tubes
Sturdy on flat surface; Easy no hassle no tools 5-minutes assembly even a kid can accomplish
Please Read the dimension carefully; perfect for small area end table or night stand; can be used as indoor plant stand as well
Assembled Dimension: 15. 6-Inches wide by 19. 6-Inches high by 15. 6-Inches deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,604 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
